name: Real Time Assist Replay Time
storyline: This game is slot machine simulator. So fun to compete for scores. And can listen to cute songs.
summary: "Real Time Assist Replay Time" is a slot machine simulator released by "honwakafuwafuwa" (in Japanese "ほんわかふわふわ")
